      • getInstance

        public static Tool getInstance()
        Returns:
        returns tool instance creates the instance if does not exist yet

      • brushTiles

        public static void brushTiles(java.awt.Point relativePoint,
                              MapState mapStates,
                              Tileset tileset,
                              boolean hover)
        Adds all selected tiles in tileset in the 2d map in the corresponding layer.
        Parameters:
        relativePoint - the relative position of the mouse point
        mapStates - the states of the map
        tileset - the current tileset origin of the tiles selected
        hover - if is a click or just a mouse hover on point
        Since:
        0.5

      • brushTiles

        public static void brushTiles(java.awt.Point relativePoint,
                              MapState mapStates,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Tile> copiedTiles,
                              boolean hover)
        Adds all copied tiles from clipboard to the 2d map in the corresponding layer.
        Parameters:
        relativePoint - the relative position of the mouse point
        mapStates - the states of the map
        copiedTiles - the current copied tiles present in clipboard
        hover - if is a click or just a mouse hover on point(for preview)
        Since:
        1.0b

      • RectSelect

        public static void RectSelect(java.awt.Point p1,
                              java.awt.Point p2,
                              Tileset tileset,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Tile> selectedTiles,
                              int tilesize,
                              int limitX,
                              int limitY)
        Rectangular selection between two points in the screen. Using p1 and p2 as anchors, find all tiles contained by the rectangular selection created by the two points (p1: top-left vertex; p2: bottom-right vertex) Overload: Rectangular selection of tiles in tileset
        Parameters:
        p1 - First point (top-left vertex) of rectangle selection (must be relative to scroll)
        p2 - Second point (bottom-right vertex) of rectangle selection (must be relative to scroll)
        tileset - The tileset that is currently loaded in the program
        selectedTiles - The list of tiles that will contain the selected of tiles
        tilesize - The size of a tile
        limitX - the limit in the X-axis for selection (bounds)
        limitY - the limit in the Y-axis for selection (bounds)
        Since:
        0.4

      • SelectTile

        public static void SelectTile(java.awt.Point relativeClick,
                              Tileset tileset,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Tile> selectedTiles,
                              java.awt.Point shiftOrigin,
                              boolean ofMap)
        Finds what tile was clicked in the viewport and adds it to selected tiles list. The way of adding varies if ctrl or shift keys are pressed. no key pressed: Resets selected list to contain only the new selected item CTRL key pressed: Adds to the selected tiles list maintaining previous selected items SHIFT key pressed: Selects tiles in a rectangular shape based on the clicked tile and the first tile clicked in the shift interaction
        Parameters:
        relativeClick - the relative position of the click
        tileset - the tileset that is currently loaded in the program
        selectedTiles - the list of tiles that will contain the selection of tiles
        shiftOrigin - the position origin of the shift click
        ofMap - if it is the map's viewport or the tileset's viewport that was clicked
        Since:
        0.3

      • eraseTile

        public static void eraseTile(java.awt.Point relativePoint,
                             MapState mapStates,
                             boolean hover)
        Method for erasing tiles in the 2d map in the corresponding layer. If parameter hover is true, just preview the tile that is going to be erased if a click happens
        Parameters:
        relativePoint - the relative position of the mouse point
        mapStates - the states of the map
        hover - if is a click or just a mouse hover on point
        Since:
        0.5

      • eraseSelection

        public static void eraseSelection(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> selection,
                                  MapState mapStates,
                                  int selectedLayer)
        Erases a selection of tile of current selected layer
        Parameters:
        selection - the array of tiles to be erased
        mapStates - the states map with all its states
        selectedLayer - the selected layer to erase tiles from
        Since:
        1.0

      • copyToClipboard

        public static void copyToClipboard(MapState mapStates)
        Copies the current selected tiles of current selected layer to the clipboard for further uses
        Parameters:
        mapStates - the states map with all its states
        Since:
        1.0

        Since:
